company: Sustainable Outreach and Universal Leadership (SOUL) Limited
description: Built a scalable Facility Management web platform to discover, register, and book open spaces, enabling users to host or join events, manage facilities, and interact with real-time updates.
achievements: Engineered robust booking APIs with CRUD operations, input validation, and concurrency control, ensuring reliable booking during high user load.
Redesigned homepage with real-time updates using WebSockets and responsive UI, improving engagement by 35% and system reliability by 40%.
Implemented scalable data models and geospatial queries using PostGIS to manage and analyze over 100+ parks and open spaces.
Integrated multi-option cart logic with Redux to streamline booking and payment flow, improving UX and conversion rate.
Optimized application performance, reducing load time by 50% and increasing user retention and satisfaction metrics.

company: Sustainable Outreach and Universal Leadership (SOUL) Limited
description: Contributed to the early development of a government-backed open space management system with a focus on user experience, data structure, and secure access.
achievements: Collaborated in UX design for both web and mobile platforms, creating user-friendly booking flows with Figma.
Developed backend data models to manage space listings, schedules, and user roles across public assets.
Assisted in requirement gathering directly with clients, documenting use cases and translating them into engineering specs.
Implemented secure authentication and role-based access, reducing login issues by 30% and improving platform reliability.
Played a key role in integrating real-time space availability data into the frontend UI.
